entry.title: AUXO Cira Concentrate Vaporizer
entry.summary:
Vendor: AUXO
Type: VAPORIZER - CONCENTRATE
Price: 99.99

The AUXO Cira was designed around your needs and made to be enjoyed. It’s an ultra-precise, temperature-controlled vaporizer for concentrates that will leave you wondering what you ever did without it.

Features Overview

  • Temperature range from 450–1000℉
  • Precise temperature control
  • Easy-to-read OLED display
  • 20-second heat-up time
  • Dual 2200mAh batteries
  • Extended heating mode

 

Full Product Specs & Features:

  • Dimensions: 129.8(H) × 76.2 (W) × 59.5 (D) mm (Cira Device and Charging Base only)
  • Weight: 340g (Cira Device and Charging Base only)
  • Screen: OLED Screen

  • Glass Piece: Borosilicate Glass
  • Heating Chamber: Titanium/Quartz
  • Battery Housing: Aluminum Alloy
  • Charging Base: Zinc Alloy

  • Compatible With: Concentrates
  • Heat-Up Time: 20-Second
  • Temperature Range: 450 – 1000 ℉

  • Battery Life: 30-Session Use
  • Battery Type: High Quality Lithium Battery
  • Charging Time: 150 Minutes
  • Capacity: 2200mAh/7.4v

 

The Cira was made to be enjoyed. Its precise temperature control, long-lasting battery life, and thoughtful design make it the ultimate e-rig. It does the work so you can create more joyful moments.

Precise Temperature Control – Powered by AUXO innovative Heating Wire Technology*, Cira delivers unrivaled heating uniformity for more balanced, consistent and controlled sessions. No need to choose between any heat settings. Set the temperature with more precision and start customizing your experience. (*Pat. Pending)

Extended Heating Mode – Cira’s extended heating mode feature enables you to keep the heat with a 15-second, mid-cycle extension. This function comes in handy when you want a temperature boost, or when you’re looking to share with friends. You can add as many 15s extensions as you’d like by simply double clicking the + button within 10s of the heating countdown.

Long-lasting Battery – Forgot the charger? No problem! Cira comes with dual powerful 2200mAh batteries that support more than 30 sessions when fully charged. This gives you more peace of mind when you’re out and about.

Designed Around Your Needs – Through thoughtful design, the Cira delivers. Its comfort grip and distinctive anti-scalding wave design using heat-resistant materials and user-friendly features provide the safest and most enjoyable vaporizer experience. The OLED monitor displays temperature and battery life so that you know exactly what’s going on with your Cira at a quick glance.

entry.title: Dr. Dabber GHOST Vaporizer Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dr. Dabber
Type: Vaporizer
Price: 44.99

The Dr. Dabber Ghost vape pen is the original low-heat vaporizer pen for oils and waxes. Our Titanium Technology heats to the ideal temperature slowly, instead of burning red hot on contact. This eliminates the burned, electric taste synonymous with vaporizer pens, ensuring you can enjoy the flavor of your oils or waxes. The Ghost Vaporizer Kit comes with everything you need to get started, including a USB Charger, silicone storage ball, loading tool and extra replacement titanium atomizer.

 

  • Sleek, Portable Design
  • Long Battery Life
  • USB Charging
  • Dab Tool Included
  • Extra Replacement Top Included
  • Shatterproof Storage Ball Included

entry.title: Dr. Dabber SWITCH Vaporizer Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dr. Dabber
Type: Vaporizer
Price: 344.90

The Dr. Dabber SWITCH is a revolutionary, patent-pending induction heating vaporizer for both oils and flowers. With the press of a button, you can transform the SWITCH from a full-fledged oil rig into an electric flower vaporizer. This unmatched versatility, paired with the incredible heating speed and unparalleled battery life puts the Dr. Dabber SWITCH in a league of its own. With 150 uses on a single charge as well as pass-through charging, the SWITCH can be used as both a desktop and a portable vaporizer. Welcome to the Future.

Kit Includes: Dab Tool, Silicone Wax Container, Reverse Action Tweezers, Ceramic Flower Filter, Carb Cap, Glass Percolator Attachment, & Quick Reference Cards.

 

  • Power Output up to 120W
  • Battery Capacity: 33.3 watt-hours
  • Compatible with Flower and Concentrates
  • Precision Heating Induction Cups
  • Customizable Hold Times
  • Self-Cleaning Mode
  • Auto Cooldown Cycles
  • Standby Lighting
  • Integrated Power Management
  • Pass Through Charging
  • Glass Percolator Attachment Included
  • Sleek, Stylish Design


Powerful & Smart

Whether it’s particularly dense flower or very viscous oil, the SWITCH has 25 carefully calibrated heat settings to handle any situation. These 25 heat settings aren't just a selling feature...there is method to our madness. If you want an emphasis on flavor, there is a setting for that. If you prefer superior vapor density, there’s a setting for that too. If you want to crank it up for a cloudy experience, no problem. Running out of material at home and want to use a smaller amount than you normally do? Just turn it down a couple notches. The SWITCH is designed by people who understand that no two hits are the same, just like no two flowers or oils are the same. The SWITCH’s versatility is simply astounding.

A Battery Built for Real Life

The SWITCH is capable of up to 150 uses on a single charge. These are not laboratory numbers, this is real life. For the average user, this means well over a week of use on a single charge. Add to that the convenience of pass-through charging, and you can choose to use the SWITCH whichever way fits your life. This kind of efficiency and versatility in a device as powerful as the SWITCH is simply unheard of. Taking into account that a full charge takes only 60 minutes, it’s safe to say the SWITCH is in a league of its own.

The Power & Speed of Induction

The patent-pending induction heating technology inside allows the device to heat to target temperature in an incredibly short amount of time. We’re talking an average of 4 seconds (depending on selected temperature). This sort of speed is simply not possible with traditional convection and conduction vaporizers. On top of that, the induction heating setup allows for the electronics to be completely sealed off from the heating element, meaning absolutely no possibility of mechanical failure due to leakage. You can literally pour water into the heating element of the SWITCH and press the button and it would simply bring the water inside the dish to a boil. The SWITCH is NOT like other vaporizers.

entry.title: Yocan UNI Pro Digital Box Mod
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant Distribution
Type: Vaporizer
Price: 22.50

The Yocan UNI Pro is a universally compatible Digital Box Mod that works with all oil atomizers of all lengths and sizes. It brings vape customization and personalization to the next level.

This Patented Digital Box Mod features a chamber with adjustable width and height to ensure that all oil atomizers will fit snugly regardless of size or shape. In addition to its patented adjustable design, it also features a 10-second preheat function, a volt range of 2.0V–4.2V, and a hanging hole for easy attachment to a strap or lanyard. The bright OLED display clearly indicates voltage and remaining change, and the simple button interface allows for easy operation.

The Yocan UNI Pro Digital Box Mod celebrated for its minimalist design, amazing portability, and straightforward operation. It’s perfect for travelling and can be enjoyed by vape users at every experience level. Available in a wide variety of colors, there’s a UNI Pro for every occasion and it will still make an excellent addition to your collection. With unmatched customization and impressive performance, You’ll be vaping like a pro in no time with the UNI Pro Digital Box Mod from Yocan.

Specs & Features:

  • Yocan Patented Design
  • Fit Your Favorite 510 Cartridges
  • Customize Voltage Option (2.0V to 4.2V)
  • Universal Box Mod & Oil Level Window
  • Compact & Portable
  • 650mAh Battery Capacity & USB Charging
  • 510-Threaded Magnetic Connection
  • Adjustable Chamber Height & Width
  • 15 seconds cut-off
  • Preheat Mode: Click the power button twice
  • OLED Display
  • Built with Hanging Hole

Included Items

  • 1 x Yocan UNI Pro Box Mod
  • 1 x Micro USB Cable
  • 1 x Magnetic 510 Ring
  • 1 x User Manual

entry.title: Yocan Apex Mini Vaporizer Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant Distribution
Type: Vaporizer
Price: 15.50

The Yocan Apex Mini Vaporizer is a smaller and more compact version of the innovative Apex dab pen. Despite its small size, the Apex Mini offers all of the same functionality as its larger predecessor while being more discrete and portable than ever.

Thanks to smart design, the Yocan Apex Mini can make the most of its small er battery. By heading in waves, it conserves power while still yielding impressive results in seconds. The newly designed Coil Cap will greatly reduce the risk of spills, which is also thanks in part to the extra deep chamber.

The Yocan Apex Mini s celebrated for its minimalist design, amazing portability, and straightforward operation. This vape pen is perfect for travelling and can be enjoyed by vape users at every experience level. Even if you already own several vapes, the Apex Mini will still make an excellent addition to your collection. With unmatched portability and impressive performance, there’s a lot to like in this small but mighty package.

Specs & Features:

  • 380mAh battery
  • Variable Voltage Settings
  • Quartz Dual Coil
  • Newly Designed Coil Cap
  • USB Charging
  • Sleek and Discreet

Included Items

  • 1 x QDC (Quartz Dual Coil)
  • 1 x Dab Tool
  • 1 x USB Charging Cable
  • 1 x User Manual

entry.title: Spinach™ Vape Charging Kit – Battery + USB Charger
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant Distribution
Type: Battery
Price: 10.99

From the vape experts at Chronos Device Labs comes the Spinach™ 510 Vape Battery. This vape pen is compact, discrete, and provides adjustable, state-of-the-art vaporizer technology in the palm of your hand.

Connector
> An industry-standard 510 thread provides a secure and reliable connection to any Spinach™ Cartridge.

LED Indicator
> Provides information about the device’s charge status and operation.

Puff Sensor
> Immediate inhale detection and response for optimal vaporization.

Power Button (3 Level Control)
> Allows you to choose between intensity levels: Mild, Medium, and Maximum (1-3 clicks, respectively)

Microcontroller
> Contains an exclusive, Chronos-designed intelligent chip to deliver the ultimate Spinach™ experience.

Battery Management Unit
> Integrated electronics protect the cell by regulating currents to prevent overcharging.

Battery Cell
> A specially designed battery delivers vapor quickly and delivers 80-100 puffs per charge.

 

Spinach™, is not your average greens! They have High Expectations™ for their Farm-to-Bowl™ products, and safety testing is one of the few things they take seriously.

Explore a world of new possibilities with the MIQRO Explorers Collection from DaVinci. This all-encompassing collection is perfect for intrepid cannabis connoisseur looking to vape on the go. It included everything you need to get the most out of your MIQRO vaporizer.

The DaVinci MIQRO is a small, sleek, and sophisticated loose-leaf vaporizer crafted to fit your lifestyle. The vape masters at Davinci have packed all the flavor, quality, and precision from their flagship IQ into the smallest premium vaporizer on the market today. The MIQRO is the perfect choice for the micro-doser or light user.

Founded in 2011, DaVinci Tech is of the OGs of the vape game. Like their Renaissance inventor namesake, they have become know for relentless innovation and the pursuit of perfection. Through mindful design, meticulous engineering, and a vision for innovative solutions, DaVinci Tech continues to lead the pack on elevating the cannabis experience at every level.

It works great with dried flower, but really shines by bringing out the finer properties of concentrates. An ultimate gift for the serious smoker, the Pulsar Rök is a perfect marriage of both sleek, futuristic form and supreme functionality.

As veterans of the vaping industry, Pulsar has always been at the forefront of developing products that allow the modern-day smoker to #EnjoyHigherCulture in their everyday life. This means providing consumers with products that are not only high in quality but are also easy to use and reasonably priced. The Pulsar Rök Electric Dab Rig delivers on all fronts and represents the next great experience in premium innovation.

entry.title: Exxus Mini With FREE Puff Puff Pass Electric Grinder Pen
entry.summary:
Vendor: Exxus
Type: Vaporizer
Price: 69.90

LIMITED TIME PROMO

Buy Exxus Mini get a Puff Puff Pass Electric Grinder Pen for FREE!

--

Exxus Mini has the distinction of being the smallest vape of its type. This vaporizer is merely an inch in width and four inches in height, is very easy to carry around. It has a variety of features that should wow people who are looking for quality vaporizers. Its warm-up time is just 30 seconds. The vaporizer has a convenient mouthpiece air path system that offers heat reduction benefits as well. Its highest possible temperature is 410 degrees. The Exxus Mini features an anodized heating chamber. Its body is made of aluminum gunmetal that contributes to its fashionable, cool and modern look. 

 

How to Use:

  1. Remove the mouthpiece and loosely pack your favorite legal herb into the chamber.
  2. Clip the mouthpiece back on then rapidly click the power button five times to turn device.
  3. Use the arrow buttons to set device to desired temperature. Device will take a maximum of 30 seconds to heat up.
  4. Inhale vapor and enjoy!

 Pro Tip – Purchase the Exxus Hydro Adapter to boost performance by 75%.

 

Product Includes:

  • 1 x Exxus Mini
  • 1 x Cleaning Brush
  • 1 x Stirring Tool
  • 1 x Silicone Mouthpiece
  • 1 x Silicone cradle
  • 1 x USB Cable
  • 1 x User Manual

Warranty – Exxus Mini include a limited one-year manufacturer warranty.
